ovdesc.p: When a Deal is input with Participation and Commission is recovered as END type, this file gets built. The details held are the Deal reference, Deal currency and commission break-up participant-wise. For each of the Participant a multi-value set is built showing the accrual with details such as Start commission period, End commission Period, Commission amount and Tax amount if any.
On completion of a schedule the details get written as Past start date, Past end date, Past commission and Past tax if any for each Participant.
